item.title: [EN] Migrating to Java 10
item.description: Today was a great day. We decided to migrate from Java 8 to Java 10 üéâ. Migration Our main application is running spring-boot 1.5.x, and despite this disclaimer, we gave a try and succeded! (we are not ready to migrate to spring-boot 2.x because we have a lot of tooling to migrate and this needs to be planned) Even if Java 9 and 10 did not introduced major features we need, the migration is a good opportunity to prepare the future and to stick to latest versions.
